attributes.action: extend the free fruit scheme to all primary school age children not just infants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, the government provides 
free fruit to all infants at primary school. The scheme does not at present extend to juniors. I believe it is just as, if not more important to include  this age group in the scheme to help and encourage ALL primary school age children reach their - five a day - government - target.
